fields.label: Add all applicable tax codes to be reported on per ATO requirements

fields.description: 1A - GST collected. Select liability accounts relating to GST tax collected (sales)
fields.label: Sales Tax (1A)

fields.description: 1B - GST spent. Select liability accounts relating to GST tax spent (purchases)
fields.label: Purchase Tax (1B)

fields.description: W1 - Total salary, wages and other payments. Select expense accounts relating to salary, wages and other payments
fields.label: Sales, wages and other Payments (W1)
Exempt from FBT under section 57A of the FBTAA 1986

fields.description: Specify a temporary Liability account for use in the creation of the journal entry when completing the BAS. When payment is made to ATO, create journal entry offsetting this account with the payment account.
fields.label: Temporary Offset Liability Account

fields.description: Specify the supplier account specifically for ATO. Journal entries made from Business Activity Statements will appear against this supplier.
fields.label: ATO Supplier Account

fields.description: W2 - Amounts withheld from payments at W1. Select liability accounts relating to payments withheld from W1.
fields.label: Amounts withheld from payments at W1 (W2)
